Hi there,
Given an LLVM IR instruction that takes a pointer operand (e.g. load, store, etc.), is it possible to possible to deduce the Rust type of the pointer, i.e. (im)mutable Reference, Raw-Pointer, Box<T>, Rc<T> etc.?

My idea would be to use the type information present at rustc's MIR level and modify rustc to emit LLVM Metadata notes to every codegen'd pointer (maybe somewhere in rustc_codegen_ssa/mir/.. ?)

Do you think this is feasible?
